description:
The OSAPI v1.1 spec requires that minDisk and minRam are returned on a GET on image details. Example:

minDisk="5" minRam="256"

http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/List_Images-d1e4435.html
title: Add minDisk minRam to OSAPI image details

comments.content:
The OSAPI v1.0 spec requires that minDisk and minRam are returned on a GET on image details. Example:

minDisk="5" minRam="256"
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince

comments.content: Should this patch also cover enforcing these parameters in server creation?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: I think these parameters should default to 0 and be optional in create requests.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alex-meade
